questions.question: An exothermic reaction is a chemical reaction that releases energy by radiating electricity.
The colour of the pills in the Matrix were Blue and Yellow.
The inventor of the bonnet hair dryer is Alan Turing.
The Ceratosaurus, a dinosaur known for having a horn on the top of its nose, is also known to be a decendent of the Tyrannosaurus Rex.
Sargon II, a king of the Neo-Assyrian Empire, was a direct descendant of Sargon of Akkad.
There are 86400 seconds in a day.
To bypass US Munitions Export Laws, the creator of the PGP published all the source code in book form.
A bear does NOT defecate during hibernation.
Ada Lovelace is often considered the first computer programmer.
Gothenburg is the capital of Sweden.
In Alfred Hitchcock's film Psycho it is said he used chocolate syrup to simulate the blood in the famous shower scene.
When you cry in space, your tears stick to your face.
Oxford University is older than the Aztec Empire.
The board game Go has more possible legal positions than the number of atoms in the visible universe.
Hungary is the only country in the world beginning with H.
In League of Legends, there exists four different types of Dragon.
The song Scatman's World was released after Scatman (Ski-Ba-Bop-Ba-Dop-Bop).
